questions.quote: Jerry, I'll tell ya. The first thing I'm gonna do when I get back to Florida is take a shower.
No one is touching my feet. Between you and me, Elaine, I think I've got a foot odour problem.
Well, here's what I propose. Go down to the stables, snoop around. See if any high-flying cashier's been throwing twenty dollar bills around with big lips.
Well I mean the question isn't even for me it's for a friend.
"You know those shoes that Jimmy had? I cut a deal with him. We're gonna import a case of them together."
Apparently Peggy--down in Design?--got into a liiiittle bit of a Tiff yesterday with somebody named, "Susie"?
Poor little bubble boy. He's sitting there waiting for you in his bubble, or igloo thing, whatever.
You don't think that someone having a baby warrants an exclamation point.
Yeah? Well, you bombed! That story stunk worse than these chairs!
Oh leave Jack alone. Jack's got enough problems. I'll just take the small office.
